```{r}
library(exscidata)
data("dxadata")

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

muskel <- dxadata %>%
  select(participant:include, lean.left_leg, lean.right_leg) %>%
  filter(include == "incl") %>%
  pivot_longer(names_to = "leg", 
               values_to = "lean.mass", 
               cols = lean.left_leg:lean.right_leg) %>%
  mutate(leg = if_else(leg == "lean.left_leg", "L", "R"), 
         sets = if_else(multiple == leg, "multiple", "single")) %>%
  select(participant, time, sex, sets,lean.mass) %>%
  group_by(participant) %>%
  mutate(n = n(), group = factor(sets, levels = c("single", "multiple")), time = factor(time, levels = c("pre", "post"))) %>%
  print()

muskel %>%
 ggplot(aes(time, lean.mass, group = participant, color = group)) + geom_line() + theme_minimal()


muskel1 <- muskel %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = time,
              values_from = lean.mass)%>%
  mutate(diff = post - pre) %>%
  group_by(sets)%>%
  summarise(m = mean(diff),
            sd = sd(diff)) %>%
   mutate(ms = paste0(signif(m, 3), "(", signif(sd, 3), ")")) %>%
  select(sets, ms) %>%
  print()

muskelprosent <- muskel %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = time,
              values_from = lean.mass)%>%
  mutate(diff = (post - pre)/pre * 100) %>%
  group_by(sets)%>%
  summarise(m = mean(diff),
            sd = sd(diff)) %>%
  mutate(ms = paste0(signif(m, 3), "(", signif(sd, 3), ")")) %>%
  select(sets, ms) %>%
  print()

```
